members.name: Mitchell Reed
members.bio: Mitchell Reed is a Band Director at Hickory High School in Chesapeake, VA. He is a native of Gloucester, Virginia and has earned a Bachelor's Degree in Music Education from Virginia Commonwealth University and a Master's Degree in Instrumental Conducting from the University of South Florida. Mr. Reed most recently served as the Director of Bands at Joe E. Newsome High School in Tampa, Florida where he led a comprehensive band and color guard program.
highlights: Bachelor's in Music Education from Virginia Commonwealth University
Master's in Instrumental Conducting from University of South Florida
Former Director of Bands at Joe E. Newsome High School
Led program to over 200 students and superior ratings
Graduate Teaching Assistant at University of South Florida
Member of The Cadets and Jersey Surf Drum and Bugle Corps

members.name: Yvonne Daye
members.bio: Ms. Yvonne M. Daye is a Band Director at Hickory High School in Chesapeake, VA. She previously served as the Director of Bands at Maury High School, Assistant Director of the Norfolk All City Jazz Band. Ms. Daye earned her Master's in Music Education with an emphasis in conducting from Old Dominion University in Norfolk, VA and Bachelor's of Music from Virginia Commonwealth University.
highlights: Master's in Music Education from Old Dominion University
Bachelor's of Music from Virginia Commonwealth University
Former Director of Bands at Maury High School
Assistant Director of Norfolk All City Jazz Band
Graduate Assistant for ODU Monarch Athletic Bands
Specialized training in student leadership development and mentorship

members.name: Derick Johnson
members.bio: Derick Johnson, a native of Newport News, Virginia, is currently in his eighth year of teaching at Crestwood Middle School in Chesapeake, Virginia. He holds both his Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Music Education from Hampton University. He currently serves as the Director of Percussion at Hickory High School, where he instructs the front ensemble, percussion ensemble, and winter drumline.
highlights: Bachelor's and Master's in Music Education from Hampton University
Eight years of teaching at Crestwood Middle School
Crestwood Middle School Teacher of the Year 2023
Director of Percussion at Hickory High School
Innovative Percussion Artist
Clinician and arranger for percussion ensembles nationwide

members.name: Aubrey Horstman
members.bio: Aubrey Horstman contributes to the success of the Hickory High School Band Program through dedicated instruction and mentorship in color guard and visual arts education.
highlights: Color Guard Director at Hickory High School
Specialist in visual arts education
Dedicated to student mentorship and development
